title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5018.1 - Valuation rate of interest, salary scale and COLA assumptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5018.1 - Valuation rate of interest, salary scale and COLA assumptions

State Regulations

For the purpose of performing the annual valuation of the

Retirement System, the valuation rate of interest shall be 7.25 percent, the
assumed rate of COLA increase shall be 1.50 percent, and the salary scale
assumption shall be as follows: Salary Scale
